overview: Matthias Von Fistenberg went to Rio with $10 and a tube of chapstick, and somehow manged to launch a series of incredibly hot bareback scenes with some of the sexiest, tanned and well hung studs we have ever seen grace the covers of our movies. Now, we've selected the best and most popular scenes and re-issued them…Best Of Brazil: Vol. 1 features 5 scenes, originally appearing in White Hot, Favela Fuckers and Rio After Dark.
title: Best Of Brazil: Vol. 1
